name: Ferryman's Dilemma
description:
In Ferryman's Dilemma, you are the owner of a ferry service that connects two shores of a river.

Your job is simple, help people cross the river. But you only have ONE boat and there are a lot of passengers.

The maximum load of the boat is 180 Kg. You must manage to transport the people before they run out of pacience and leave, giving your service a bad review.

Be careful, the passengers are fussy and they could refuse to travel with someone only because they don't like the color of their shirt.

Good luck!

Developed by Pedro García, 19pegavi95@gmail.com.

Sound effects obtained from https://freesound.org.
